about_the_game:
Enhance your tactical playstyle with two agile and elusive characters, Roxy and Kayla, each armed with their own powerful weapons and abilities.

Roxy

Harnessing the power of shadows and darkness, Roxy evades bullets, showcasing her prowess in close-range combat.

Weapons

  • ZAPPER
    The Zapper has low damage but boasts a high fire rate and excellent accuracy, making it ideal for close combat. You can rush in and eliminate your enemies swiftly.
  • TECA
    Teca in our game is a versatile secondary weapon with moderate damage, good accuracy, and a low fire rate. It functions like a hybrid between a pistol and a rifle, making it an excellent choice for players who need a reliable backup in various combat situations.
  • KNIFE
    The knife excels in close combat with a slightly limited attack range, but its speed is more than sufficient for quick, effective strikes.

Ability

Roxy possesses the extraordinary ability to seamlessly navigate through shadows, granting her the power to evade incoming bullets while remaining in this elusive state. However, should she choose to fire her weapon, she will inevitably emerge from the shadow state, exposing herself to potential danger.

Kayla

Effortlessly navigating the battlefield, Kayla strategically positions herself at both the front and back lines, determined to support her team at any cost while skillfully evading bullets. This allows her to move more fluidly through the chaos of combat.

Weapons

  • VOLTA
    The Volta deals moderate damage but excels with its high fire rate, excellent accuracy, and perfect control, making it a great weapon for both close and long-range combat.
  • FLEX
    The Flex boasts great damage and aim speed, making it perfect for long-range engagements. With a 20-round magazine, it serves as an excellent backup weapon, ensuring you won’t run out of ammo when you need it most.
  • KNIFE
    The knife excels in close combat with a slightly limited attack range, but its speed is more than sufficient for quick, effective strikes.

Ability

Kayla possesses the extraordinary ability to gracefully dodge bullets, akin to a butterfly evading a predator, relying on her keen instincts and uncanny timing to outmaneuver any threat.
